names of distances used in Ilio Phosphol and Ilio Vespol's IntensityCurves:

		Distance_kAU	DistanceMeters
Radius	0.00566194389	84701475
3 Radii	0.01698583167	254104425
SOI		0.0856694117	1281596157
INKO	0.45			6731904182
ABb		0.63263			9464010094
rootV	0.705762		10558049242
1 au	1				14959787070
ABc		1.16532			17432939068
rootP	1.22715			18357902703
root2	1.41421			21156280472
ABd		1.527			22843594856
ABe		2.00094			29933636340
Pyri	6.364			95204084913
ABCb	12.62			188792512823
ABCc	17.44328		260947754602
ABCd	24.98525		373774019891
Limit	500				7479893535000

RootV = square root of Ilio Vespol's luminosity in Lsol, astronomical units
RootP = square root of Ilio Phosphol's luminosity in Lsol, astronomical units
Root2 = square root of 2 astronomical units.

names of distance values used in Pyri's intensity curves.
There's more here because Pyri moves around relative to everything else a whole lot more than Ilio does.

			Distance_kAU	Distance_m
Radius		0.000498065044	7450947.005
3 Radii		0.001494195132	22352841.02
10 Radii	0.00498065044	74509470.05
25 Radii	0.0124516261	186273675.1
40 Radii	0.01992260176	298037880.2
Cd			0.022			329115315.5
Sqrt Lsol	0.02214			331209685.7
Ce Peri		0.1144			1711399641
Ce SMA		0.1483			2218536422
Ce Apo		0.1822			2725673204
avg CeAp&Cf	0.3401			5087823583
Cf			0.498			7449973961
OuterLimit	0.527			7883807786
HillSphere	1.5091			22575814667
SOI			1.756			26269386095
PyriSMA		6.364			95204084913
ABeNear		4.36306395		65270507665
ABdNear		4.837			72360490058
